fal dara.name: fal dara
fal dara.description: Far north city and strong hold of Shienar. The homes are A frame style houses with wooden shingles and angled chimneys to let snow slide past.

alcruna.name: alcruna
alcruna.description: Village in Amaador that Geofram was ordered to travel, where he would recieve his final orders.

the spray.name: the spray
the spray.description: 80 ft long with 2 masts and broad in the beam with room for cargo on the deck and in the hold.

tremonsien.name: tremonsien
tremonsien.description: cairhien village on a flattened hill top with terraces and retaining walls.

tema.name: tema
tema.description: Head Groom of Fal Dara's Keep. Received orders passed by Uno to not let horses out of the stables.

ragan.name: ragan
ragan.description: Soldier and Guard in Fal Dara

masema.name: masema
masema.description: Soldier and Guard in Fal Dara

uno.name: uno
uno.description: Soldier and Guard in Fal Dara

changu.name: changu
changu.description: Dungeon guard in Fal Dara. Was on watch when Rand and Egwene visited Padan Fain.

nidao.name: nidao
nidao.description: Dungeon guard in Fal Dara. Was on watch when Rand and Egwene visited Padan Fain.

verin mathwin.name: verin mathwin
verin mathwin.description: Studied the trolloc script written on the wall in blood and filth in Fal Dara prisons. Found it most interesting.

sarafelle.name: sarafelle
sarafelle.description: Studied the trolloc script written on the wall in blood and filth in Fal Dara prisons. Found it most interesting.

amalisa jagad.name: amalisa jagad
amalisa jagad.description: Tortured and manipulated by Liandrin Sedai into searching for Rand.

kajin.name: kajin
kajin.description: After the attack on Fal Dara keep, he checks for anybody missing. Indicating those missing people could be darkfriends that betrayed Fal Dara.

hurin.name: hurin
hurin.role: Sniffer for Fal Dara. Tracked down the Horn of Valere

bayle domon.name: bayle domon
bayle domon.role: Captain and Owner of The Spray

nieda sidoro.name: nieda sidoro
nieda sidoro.role: Inn Keeper of Easing the Badger

carn.name: carn
carn.description: Crewman on the spray who was tortured and killed by darkfriends in Illian when Bayle Domon refuest to go east.

whatley eldin.name: whatley eldin
whatley eldin.description: Rand watched him paint a cart with pinstrips and bright colors.

asan sandair.name: asan sandair
asan sandair.description: gate clerk which recorded Rand, Loial, and Hurin's entry to the city of cairhien.

cuale.name: cuale
cuale.description: inn keep of the defender of the dragonwall inn. Plump, unctuous man with a single strip of green across a dark gray coat.

zera.name: zera
zera.description: Inn keep of the bunch of grapes where Thom and Dena were living in The Foregate.

ivan.name: ivan
ivan.description: Knife maker that was making Dena's knives.

seaghan.name: seaghan
seaghan.description: Theatre owner in the Foregate who employed Thom.
